A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't know where to start. The movie was boring\, unnecessarily long\, incoherent\, it has gigantic plot holes\, dull characters\, forced chemistry/interactions between them\, it lost continuity with many things established in the previous film. Its a complete mess.\n\nIf you are not a star wars fan\, you will walk out of the theater simply thinking that you just saw a bad movie\, but if you are a fan \, you will walk away disappointing  and will pretty much hate it.
